Articles.Content:
I joined way back in February but I never bothered to get involved until now.

As for my current progress in KSP, I've landed on the Mun and Duna thanks to oversized rockets.
Welcome Sickle! This forum is a great way to learn about the game- some very helpful people here. Don't hesitate to ask!
Welcome aboard! As Aethon said, check out the gameplay questions and tutorials section if you get really frustrated with anything, there are a lot of helpful people around.

Welcome aboard and if you need anything ask.

If you want to JOIN something then ask ... I'm in a number of rocket companies. So I'm the best to ask in that respect.
